divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving on I-70 west through Indianapolis watching planes taking off when I noticed a shiny circle object at a much higher altitude than the planes that were taking off when all of a sudden the object just disappeared. The object to me didn't seem very large and made no movement in any direction. I watched the object for less than 30 seconds when it just disappeared. I found this strange because it was so shiny in clear Sky's it was very noticeable so I would see the object if it moved but I didn't, it was just gone.
trends: There have been 126 other sightings in Indianapolis
There were no other sightings in Indianapolis on or around August 13th 2008
Summary: I noticed a shiny circle/oval shaped object when all of a sudden the object just disappeared.
